    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Admin
    Represents an administrator user in the library system.
    AdminActions
    Application-level fa√ßade for administrator operations.
    AdminFileLoader
    Loads administrator data from an external file into Admin objects.
    AdminRepository
    Repository for managing admin-related persistence operations.
    AdminService
    Provides services and business logic related to administrators in the library system.
    AdminSourceLoader
    Represents a source loader for administrators.
    Book
    Represents a book in the library system.
    BookAuthorSearchStrategy
    Search strategy that matches books by author name.
    BookIsbnSearchStrategy
    Search strategy that matches books by ISBN.
    BookRepository
    Repository class for managing Book entities in temporary storage.
    BookSearchStrategy
    Strategy interface for searching collections of books by a specific criterion.
    BookService
    Service layer for managing books in the library system.
    BookTitleSearchStrategy
    Search strategy that matches books by title.
    BorrowingRules
    Encapsulates borrowing eligibility rules for library members.
    CD
    Represents a Compact Disc (CD) media item with artist information and specific borrowing/fine policy.
    CDRepository
    In-memory repository for CD media items.
    CDService
    Application layer service for Compact Discs (CD) handling borrow/return operations and overdue fine calculation.
    EmailService
    Abstraction for sending emails.
    InputHandler
    Utility for reading and validating console input in the CLI application.
    Loan
    Represents a loan transaction between a library member and a book or other media.
    LoanRepository
    Repository class responsible for managing Loan entities in-memory.
    LoanService
    Service responsible for borrowing, returning, and tracking loans.
    LoginService
    Authentication facade for admins and members.
    MainApp
    Entry point for the Library Management System CLI application.
    Media
    Abstract base class for any borrowable media in the library (e.g., Book, CD).
    Member
    Represents a library member who can borrow books and manage fines.
    MemberRepository
    In-memory repository for Member entities.
    MemberService
    Provides services and business logic related to library members.
    MenuController
    Controller orchestrating CLI interactions for admins and members.
    MenuDisplay
    Console UI helper for rendering menus and lists in the Library Management System.
    OverdueEmailObserver
    Observer that listens for overdue loan notifications and triggers an email.
    OverdueObserver
    Observer contract for receiving notifications when a loan becomes overdue.
    Person
    An abstract base class representing a person in the library system.
    ReminderService
    Coordinates periodic reminder operations, such as scanning for overdue loans and notifying members via email.
    SendRealEmail
    Utility implementation of EmailService that sends real emails via SMTP.
    TestingModeLoanWatcher
    Background watcher dedicated to testing-mode loans.
    UserStatus
    Represents the operational status of an administrator in the library system.
